snippet: Giants receiver (and salsa guy) Victor Cruz turns down an opportunity to compete on "Dancing With the Stars."
abstract: Giants receiver (and salsa guy) Victor Cruz turns down an opportunity to compete on "Dancing With the Stars."
lead_paragraph: EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. - Part of the reason Giants receiver Victor Cruz's popularity has exploded this season - beyond his franchise-record 1,536 receiving yards - is his trademark salsa dance, which he has done after most of his 9 touchdowns.

headline.main: Victor Cruz Decides Not to Go 'Dancing'
